metadata.title: DPM Ishaq Dar reviews progress on foreign investments in maritime, aviation sectors

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 3 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister, Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Monday chaired a meeting to review progress on foreign investments in maritime and aviation sectors. Secretaries of Defence, Privatization, Board of Investment (BOI), Law, Maritime Affairs, and senior officials from other relevant departments attended the meeting.
